divs: Sighting Detailswe saw something coming from over this big building behind our house. me and mybrother were about to go to sleep and I was leting the dog in. then the shiplanded then something jumped out and ran in to these woods behind our house.thenwe locked all of thew doors and ran im to one of our rooms together.thething hovered there for 1 minut then flew away. without the thing that jumpedout.the next morning we went to look for the creature ,but we didnt findanything.now we dont go outside at night for anything.
